comment: Dr. A is an intelligent and respectful professor. He is able to provide a classroom environment that is welcoming, engaging, and fun. The class "Cultivating a Global Intellect" is FANTASTIC. Definitely take it if you can. I did not know what I was getting into, but I have made friends from several countries through this class. TAKE HIM.

I had Dr. Askildson for Cultivating Global Intellect and it was by far the best class I have ever taken. He is very relatable, and brought in guest speakers to really drive home the points he was making during lecture. Take him if you can!
